oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A comprehensive study of flicker noise in plasma nitrided SiON p-MOSFETs : process dependence of pre-existing and NBTI stress generated trap distribution profiles
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KAPILA, G
GOYAL, N
MAHETA, VD
OLSEN, C
AHMED, K
MAHAPATRA, S
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Flicker noise is studied in SiON p-MOSFETs before and after NBTI stress. Pre-stress noise magnitude and slope are correlated and used to verify N density distribution in gate dielectric. Post-stress noise magnitude and slope are used to explore distribution of trap generation during NBTI stress, and independently verified by using MFCP measurements. Consequence of N distribution (in SiON) on NBTI stress and recovery results is shown.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: IEEE INTERNATIONAL ELECTRON DEVICES MEETING 2008, TECHNICAL DIGEST,103-106
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: IEEE International Electron Devices Meeting,San Francisco, CA,DEC 15-17, 2008
